pages.title: The Vault Rock
pages.text: To start your vault adventures, you need a $(l)Vault Rock$() to place on the Vault Altar for it to turn into a $(l)Vault Crystal$(). $(br2)Find clusters of $(l)Vault Stone$() on Y-level -5 and below. $(br2)When mining Vault Stone, there is a 10% chance for it to drop a $(l)Chipped Vault Rock$()
Combine $(l)Chipped Vault Rocks$() together with $(l)Chromatic Iron$() in a Crafting Table to obtain a $(l)Vault Rock$()
